communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Description of Records Sought:

EPA Actions at ICE Contracted Facilities 

a Please provide all communications between EPA and GEO regarding potential violations, warnings, or inspections sent or received from January 1, 2019, until the date on which EPA tasks an adequate search. 

b Please provide any record showing the total number of EPA investigations at secure facilities operated by The GEO Group, Inc., CoreCivic, Management & Training Corporation, LaSalle Corrections, Akima Global Services, Ahtna, Emerald, or GPS, since January 2017. 

Thank you,
Andrew Free
#DetentionKills Transparency Initiative 
Al Otro Lado

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Free

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Description of Records Sought:

Tacoma HDQ Neutral Warning
2.a Any reports, findings appendices, or other records that led to this FIFRA warning letter, signed July 6, 2021, by the Chief of the EPA air and land enforcement branch GEO Tacoma Facility Administrator Bruce Scott. https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dFpHxm43mlTuQRMMYDzjZMPSX7A_0Mr_/view?usp=drivesdk which is referenced in this article: https://www.knkx.org/news/2021-07-15/epa-warns-private-prison-company-about-pesticide-misuse-at-tacoma-ice-facility

2.b Any follow up correspondence between GEO and EPA regarding this warning letter. 

Thank you,
Andrew Free
#DetentionKills Transparency Initiative 
Al Otro Lado

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Free

title: McLennan County Administrator Justin Chapman Reneau Exit

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please send me the Exit Letter from Stephanie Reneau of the Sheriff's Department to HR and the Sheriff's department giving notice of her quitting her job at the MCSO.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
